stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap a piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice. Use this ability only once per turn.
text:
When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap a piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Cordyceps
